item.title: About
item.description: Giovanni Petrantoni Mid 30s, originally from Italy, Living in Kyoto. Speaks Italian, English and Japanese. Twitter - https://twitter.com/voidtarget LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/in/giovanni-petrantoni-60602379 Github - https://github.com/sinkingsugar Work experience (from most recent) Ethereum 2 - Nimbus client @ status.im Joined the team to work on the networking layer of the nimbus ETH2 client Core contributor Specialized on the nim-lip2p implementation https://nimbus.team/ Fragcolor Inc. Founded Fragcolor Inc. in Kyoto, a company focused in artificial intelligence with a focus on videogames.
